message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. This is a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. I would like to counteroffer at $10,000.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $10,000 is still a bit low for me. I'm willing to come down to $11,500. This reflects the true value of the product and gives you a good deal. What do you say?
I understand Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I would like to counteroffer at $11,000.
